text: @TimRunsHisMouth @USMC2020 Here’s the next phase of their plan, already in the works.. “Senator Markey has sent multiple letters to the Trump administration raising concerns about the potential for contact tracing technologies to violate civil liberties.” https://t.co/Shpm05QpnP
